Deutsch: Jum'a; Freitag; Tag des gemeinsamen Gebets der Muslime
English: jummah or Friday, when Muslims gather to attend prayers (loanword from Arabic)
francais: Jummah ou Vendredi, lorsque les musulmans se rassemblent pour prier (emprunt de l'arabe)

d.f: `回教徒~`稱~`一個~`星期~`為~`一個~「`主麻~」。`為~`阿拉伯語~ jum'a`的~`音譯~。`每~`個~`星期~`五~`聚集~`做禮拜~，`稱~`為~「`主麻~`日~」。

Deutsch: Jum'a; Freitag; Tag des gemeinsamen Gebets der Muslime
English: jummah or Friday, when Muslims gather to attend prayers (loanword from Arabic)
